import { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from "axios"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; function SignUp() { const [name, setName] = useState(); const [email, setEmail] = useState(); const [password, setPassword] = useState(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); axios.post("http://localhost:8000/api/users/register", {name, email, password}) //Check for port no. .then(result => {console.log(result) navigate('/login') }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (

setName(e.target.value)} />

setPassword(e.target.value)} />

); } export default SignUp;
